org.apache.flink.core.memory

类 HybridMemorySegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegment
      • org.apache.flink.core.memory.HybridMemorySegment

  • @Internal
public final class HybridMemorySegment
extends MemorySegment
    This class represents a piece of memory managed by Flink. The memory can be on-heap or off-heap, this is transparently handled by this class.

    This class specializes byte access and byte copy calls for heap memory, while reusing the multi-byte type accesses and cross-segment operations from the MemorySegment.

    This class subsumes the functionality of the HeapMemorySegment, but is a bit less efficient for operations on individual bytes.

    Note that memory segments should usually not be allocated manually, but rather through the MemorySegmentFactory.

    • 字段详细资料

      • offHeapBuffer

        private final java.nio.ByteBuffer offHeapBuffer
        The direct byte buffer that allocated the off-heap memory. This memory segment holds a reference to that buffer, so as long as this memory segment lives, the memory will not be released.

      • ADDRESS_FIELD

        private static final java.lang.reflect.Field ADDRESS_FIELD
        The reflection fields with which we access the off-heap pointer from direct ByteBuffers.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HybridMemorySegment

        HybridMemorySegment(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Creates a new memory segment that represents the memory backing the given direct byte buffer. Note that the given ByteBuffer must be direct ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(int), otherwise this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException.

        The owner referenced by this memory segment is null.

        参数:
        buffer - The byte buffer whose memory is represented by this memory segment.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, if the given ByteBuffer is not direct.

      • HybridMemorySegment

        HybridMemorySegment(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                    java.lang.Object owner)
        Creates a new memory segment that represents the memory backing the given direct byte buffer. Note that the given ByteBuffer must be direct ByteBuffer.allocateDirect(int), otherwise this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException.

        The memory segment references the given owner.

        参数:
        buffer - The byte buffer whose memory is represented by this memory segment.
        owner - The owner references by this memory segment.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, if the given ByteBuffer is not direct.

      • HybridMemorySegment

        HybridMemorySegment(byte[] buffer)
        Creates a new memory segment that represents the memory of the byte array.

        The owner referenced by this memory segment is null.

        参数:
        buffer - The byte array whose memory is represented by this memory segment.

      • HybridMemorySegment

        HybridMemorySegment(byte[] buffer,
                    java.lang.Object owner)
        Creates a new memory segment that represents the memory of the byte array.

        The memory segment references the given owner.

        参数:
        buffer - The byte array whose memory is represented by this memory segment.
        owner - The owner references by this memory segment.

        public final void get(int index,
                      byte[] dst)
        从类复制的说明: MemorySegment
        Bulk get method. Copies dst.length memory from the specified position to the destination memory.
        指定者:
        get 在类中 MemorySegment
        参数:
        index - The position at which the first byte will be read.
        dst - The memory into which the memory will be copied.

        指定者:
        put 在类中 MemorySegment
        参数:
        index - The index in the memory segment array, where the data is put.
        src - The source array to copy the data from.

        dst - The memory into which the memory will be copied.

                      byte[] src,
                      int offset,
                      int length)
        从类复制的说明: MemorySegment

        指定者:
        put 在类中 MemorySegment
        参数:
        index - The position in the memory segment array, where the data is put.
        src - The source array to copy the data from.
        offset - The offset in the source array where the copying is started.
        length - The number of bytes to copy.

      • put

        public final void put(java.io.DataInput in,
                      int offset,
                      int length)
               throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: MemorySegment
        Bulk put method. Copies length memory from the given DataInput to the memory starting at position offset.
        指定者:
        put 在类中 MemorySegment
        参数:
        in - The DataInput to get the data from.
        offset - The position in the memory segment to copy the chunk to.
        length - The number of bytes to get.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the DataInput encountered a problem upon reading, such as an End-Of-File.

      • get

        public final void get(int offset,
                      java.nio.ByteBuffer target,
                      int numBytes)
        从类复制的说明: MemorySegment
        Bulk get method. Copies numBytes bytes from this memory segment, starting at position offset to the target ByteBuffer. The bytes will be put into the target buffer starting at the buffer's current position. If this method attempts to write more bytes than the target byte buffer has remaining (with respect to Buffer.remaining()), this method will cause a BufferOverflowException.
        指定者:
        get 在类中 MemorySegment
        参数:
        offset - The position where the bytes are started to be read from in this memory segment.
        target - The ByteBuffer to copy the bytes to.
        numBytes - The number of bytes to copy.

      • put

        public final void put(int offset,
                      java.nio.ByteBuffer source,
                      int numBytes)
        从类复制的说明: MemorySegment
        Bulk put method. Copies numBytes bytes from the given ByteBuffer, into this memory segment. The bytes will be read from the target buffer starting at the buffer's current position, and will be written to this memory segment starting at offset. If this method attempts to read more bytes than the target byte buffer has remaining (with respect to Buffer.remaining()), this method will cause a BufferUnderflowException.
        指定者:
        put 在类中 MemorySegment
        参数:
        offset - The position where the bytes are started to be written to in this memory segment.
        source - The ByteBuffer to copy the bytes from.
        numBytes - The number of bytes to copy.
